name: Pyramid Structure Analyzer
description:
In this kata, you are given the sum of the number of vertices, edges, and faces of an

N-sided pyramid, which is equal to s. You need to return the number of vertices,edges,

faces, and the number of sides of the base of the pyramid.


<svg viewBox="0 0 275 55"><g
       id="g3"
       fill="#ffffff"
       stroke="#0000ff"
       stroke-width="0.1"
       transform="translate(-55.222253,-104.11371)"><path
         d="m 76.590622,104.23041 -11.49505,54.8921 44.559468,-11.88253 z"
         id="path1"
         opacity="0.8" /><path
         d="m 76.590622,104.23041 -21.31105,36.80999 9.816,18.08211 z"
         id="path2"
         opacity="0.8"
         fill="#f8f8f8" /><path
         d="m 55.279572,141.0404 54.375468,6.19958 v 0"
         id="path3"
         style="stroke-width:0.1;stroke-dasharray:0.5, 0.5;stroke-dashoffset:0;stroke-opacity:0.6" /></g><svg>
